title: LF D5+ Team (Support)

embed.description: zemljovina997 / Diamond 5 0LP / 96W 87L Win Ratio 52% / Lulu - 56W 35L Win Ratio 62%, Rakan - 27W 17L Win Ratio 61%, Braum - 20W 17L Win Ratio 54%, Janna - 11W 12L Win Ratio 48%, Alistar - 10W 8L Win Ratio 56%

body:
yo,

Da es mir realtiv egal ist ob die Sprache Englisch oder Deutsch im Team ist, habe ich meinen Post aus dem Englischen Forum einfach mal übernommen :)

Haven't played too much league the past season, was stuck p1/2 on both Accounts, decayed a bit came back like a month ago to actually tryhard and got both Accounts back to d5 with semi-good winrate (~25 games to d5 with 70/75% winrate soloq).
Peaked D3 last Season.

Now I'm looking for a competetive Team that focuses on success, I'd prefere a Team that wants to actually hit high elo in 5v5 Flex, and preferably an adc that wants to duo to high dia/master next Season, wich should be doable considering that the elo span to master will be alot faster to climb through.

The average Elo of the Team should be d5 and up.

I have a pretty deep Champion Pool from tanks to carrys im down to play it all.
My decision making is pretty solid, and I'm down to call alot of objectives etc.
Got alot of Time besides studying, i'd pref for us to play around 3 Times + per week.

If ur interessted give me an Add in League or Discord.

zemljovina997 i'll be on here tonight
eVirgin

Discord:
๖̶̶̶ۣۣۜۜ͜ζ͜͡Yoto # 1159
I linked my 2nd Account if you want to check it out.

cheers
